pullRequest.body:
A test to see how many uses of `@[reducible]` in Mathlib can be replaced with `abbrev`.

**TODOs:**
* `@[to_additive (attr := reducible)] def`
* `attribute [reducible] ConcreteCategory.forget`

nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/2c898ffe-5d32-48ce-a741-c5a7ee7fbfa9) for commit 4c81d13b49cc8584f4b351e04217d8591789912d.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/ae3f9692-4a80-4c68-b88b-9600ad7ca71a/to/2c898ffe-5d32-48ce-a741-c5a7ee7fbfa9) against commit 437c7c8b2c7814c8cf9307e56066215865ec05c2:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                      Metric         Change
  ====================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.Ring.Limits                          instructions   -27.2%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.AffineScheme                        instructions   -35.7%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.FunctionField                       instructions   -26.3%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.GammaSpecAdjunction                 instructions   -47.9%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.RingHomProperties         instructions   -18.5%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.StructureSheaf   instructions   -18.6%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Properties                          instructions   -17.6%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme                              instructions   -19.1%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Spec                                instructions   -40.3%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.StructureSheaf                      instructions   -13.2%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Internal.Module               instructions   -14.0%
+ ~Mathlib.FieldTheory.Subfield                                  instructions   -13.4%
+ ~Mathlib.FieldTheory.Subfield.Order                            instructions   -26.6%
- ~Mathlib.Logic.Small.Ring                                      instructions   474.8%
- ~Mathlib.NumberTheory.Padics.Hensel                            instructions    19.4%
+ ~Mathlib.RingTheory.Subsemiring.Order                          instructions   -23.7%
```

The significant slow-down, in Mathlib.Logic.Small.Ring, is a percentage slow-down in a fast file, so I'm not too worried there. There is a small over-all instruction speed up of about 0.5%, but unfortunately a wall-clock slow-down of 1%.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/231e7dab-c79b-4165-8eb2-9b3a4798a55c) for commit 52911273059fa90451ecf482c9d97d07d6ffaa7b.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/2de06ee6-8f3a-4848-bb67-30abbd37bfd1/to/231e7dab-c79b-4165-8eb2-9b3a4798a55c) against commit 4199e29c92ebe1352ac437120f82f1b9eb005857:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                      Metric         Change
  ====================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.Ring.Limits                          instructions   -27.1%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Field.Subfield                                instructions   -14.2%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Field.Subfield                          instructions   -26.6%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Ring.Subsemiring.Order                        instructions   -23.7%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.AffineScheme                        instructions   -35.6%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.FunctionField                       instructions   -26.2%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.GammaSpecAdjunction                 instructions   -47.8%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.RingHomProperties         instructions   -18.5%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.StructureSheaf   instructions   -18.6%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Properties                          instructions   -17.7%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Spec                                instructions   -40.2%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.StructureSheaf                      instructions   -13.0%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Internal.Module               instructions   -14.0%
- ~Mathlib.Logic.Small.Ring                                      instructions   474.8%
- ~Mathlib.NumberTheory.Padics.Hensel                            instructions    19.4%
```
Ok, wall-clock slow-down disappeared on the second bench, so let's ignore it.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8978027409/job/24657775956)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8978027409/job/24657775449)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8978027409/job/24657776307)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor: replace `@[reducible]` with `abbrev`
